TextEng: "I should go."
"You said you were one of the Red Sisters."
"I want to ask you about something else."
"How do I know if I can trust you?"
"I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable."
"Why did you leave?"
"Would you be willing to join me?"
"Tell me about the Valsharess and her allies."
"That's all I wanted to know."
"What about the devil she's enslaved?"
"How did the Valsharess get control of an undead horde?"
"What can you tell me about the beholders?"
"What kinds of effects do their eye-beams have?"
"Is it possible to negotiate with these creatures?"
"How does one fight against a beholder?"
"What do you know about the illithids?"
"I want to ask about something else."
"How does one fight against such creatures?"
"Such creatures should be slaughtered, not bargained with."
"Will you join me now?"
"I don't have much of a choice. I'm under a geas, remember?"
Text: "선택의 여지가 많지 않아. 기아스에 걸려 있잖아, 기억해?"

TextEng: "I couldn't care less about the Valsharess."
"Of course it concerns me. That's why I should be up there and not down here."
Text: "물론 걱정돼. 그래서 여기 아래가 아니라 위에 있어야 하는 거야."

TextEng: "Perhaps. I don't see why the burden should rest solely on me, however."
Text: "아마도. 하지만 왜 그 짐이 오로지 나한테만 있어야 하는지 모르겠어."

TextEng: "My task ended in Undermountain. I don't need to be a hero."
Text: "내 임무는 언더마운틴에서 끝났어. 영웅이 될 필요 없어."

TextEng: "No. Why would I worry about what happens to others?"
Text: "아니. 왜 남들에게 무슨 일이 일어나는지 걱정해야 해?"

TextEng: "I really doubt it's as world-shattering a danger as you all make it out to be."
Text: "너희가 말하는 것처럼 세상을 뒤흔들 위험인지 정말 의심스러워."

TextEng: "There is no way she is a danger to the surface world."
Text: "그녀가 지상 세계에 위협이 될 리 없어."

TextEng: "I agree. A drow queen teamed up with a powerful devil? Deadly combination."
Text: "동의해. 드로우 여왕이 강력한 마귀와 손잡았다고? 치명적인 조합이야."

TextEng: "They will be once I'm through with them."
"I have yet to receive proof that any of this is true."
"I suppose maybe they are."
"I have no reason to trust anything you say or do."
Text: "네가 하는 말이나 행동을 믿을 이유가 없어."

TextEng: "Proof of the Valsharess, yes. I have no proof of your motivations."
Text: "발샤레스에 대한 증거는 있어. 네 동기에 대한 증거는 없지만."

TextEng: "Maybe not, but this geas means I don't have a choice either way."
Text: "아닐 수도 있지만, 이 기아스 때문에 어느 쪽이든 선택의 여지가 없어."

TextEng: "I am absolutely serious. They must be stopped, without question."
Text: "난 완전히 진지해. 그들은 반드시 막아야 해, 의심의 여지 없이."

TextEng: "And it sounds like it will be quite the adventure! I can't wait!"
Text: "꽤 대단한 모험이 될 것 같아! 기대돼!"

TextEng: "Of course it does. There is nothing I can do about that, however."
Text: "물론 그래. 하지만 그건 어쩔 수 없어."

TextEng: "If I worried always about the possibility of dying, I would never accomplish anything."
Text: "항상 죽을 가능성을 걱정했다면, 아무것도 이루지 못했을 거야."

TextEng: "I just want my things back. I still can't believe she had them stolen."
Text: "내 물건만 돌려받고 싶어. 그녀가 그걸 훔치게 했다니 아직도 믿기 어려워."

TextEng: "If the last attack she sent is any indication of her power, no."
Text: "그녀가 보낸 마지막 공격이 그녀의 힘을 보여주는 거라면, 아니."

TextEng: "She should be more worried about me. And it seems she is."
Text: "그녀가 나를 더 걱정해야지. 그리고 그런 것 같아."

TextEng: "I'm doing what I must, for the good of all."
Text: "모두의 이익을 위해 해야 할 일을 하고 있어."

TextEng: "No, of course not."
"Maybe. I don't have much choice in this, after all."
Text: "아마도. 어쨌든 이 일에서 선택의 여지가 많지 않아."

TextEng: "I haven't seen any proof of this geas, yet."
Text: "아직 이 기아스에 대한 증거를 못 봤어."
